overview: When a teenage runaway develops a strange obsession with a man he sees in the desolate streets of the early morning, he decides to camp outside of the man's apartment complex and watch his every move. He notices peculiar things about the man- like his erratic sleeping routine and his constant avoidance of looking up from the ground. As the man begins to appear in his dreams bearing abstract words of existential gibberish, the boy slowly starts to uncover the meaning behind his fascinating lifestyle. But the boy will not live on without following in the man's footsteps.
title: Time is a Palindrome
